mapper.select: SELECT s.*, uf.file_name FROM STORE s LEFT JOIN UPLOAD_FILE uf ON s.FILE_ID = uf.ID WHERE s.IS_ACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY s.STORE_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE ( USER_ID, STORE_NAME, ADDRESS, STORE_HOURS, PHONE, DESCRIPTION, FILE_ID ) VALUES ( #{userId} -- 사업자 ID , #{storeName} -- 가게 이름 , #{address} -- 주소 , #{storeHours} -- 가게 영업 시간 , #{phone} -- 가게 연락처 , #{description} --가게 소개글 , #{fileId} -- 업로드한 파일 id )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE STORE_NAME = #{storeName} AND IS_ACTIVE IN (0, 1)
SELECT STORE_ID FROM STORE WHERE STORE_NAME = #{storeName} AND IS_ACTIVE IN (0, 1)
SELECT s.*, uf.file_name FROM STORE s LEFT JOIN UPLOAD_FILE uf ON S.FILE_ID = uf.ID WHERE s.STORE_ID = #{storeId} AND s.IS_ACTIVE = 1
SELECT * FROM STORE s LEFT JOIN UPLOAD_FILE uf ON S.FILE_ID = uf.ID WHERE s.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT S.* FROM STORE S JOIN STORE_CATEGORY SC ON S.STORE_ID = SC.STORE_ID WHERE SC.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} AND S.IS_ACTIVE = 1
